references.reason: It is a foundational textbook in reinforcement learning, providing a comprehensive overview of the field and its core concepts.
It introduced the Q-learning algorithm, a fundamental method in reinforcement learning that is widely used and the subject of this paper.

references.paper_title: The ODE method for convergence of stochastic approximation and reinforcement learning
references.reason: It provides the theoretical framework (ODE analysis) used to prove the convergence of the proposed algorithm in this paper.

references.paper_title: A unified switching system perspective and convergence analysis of Q-learning algorithms
references.reason: It introduced the switching system framework that forms the basis for the convergence analysis of the algorithm in this paper.

references.paper_title: An analysis of reinforcement learning with function approximation
references.reason: It provides a theoretical analysis of Q-learning with function approximation, addressing challenges related to convergence and forming the basis for the error analysis in this paper.
